user_instruction: 'Send an email to Vitality Partners to update them on our HealthHub requirements. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["partners@vitality.com"],"subject":"Updated HealthHub Requirements for Upcoming Integration","body":"Hi Vitality Partners Team,

I hope you’re doing well. Following our recent conversations, I’ve consolidated our current HealthHub requirements so that we’re all aligned before the next phase of work.

Key Requirements
• Seamless integration with our existing employee-wellness programs (single sign-on, real-time data sync).
• Tracking of individual employee health goals – steps, sleep, nutrition, mental-wellbeing check-ins, etc.
• Personalised health insights and nudges generated from aggregated data.
• A library of configurable wellness challenges (team step-offs, mindfulness streaks, hydration goals, etc.) with leaderboards and incentive management.
• Admin dashboard for real-time participation and outcome monitoring.
• GDPR/HIPAA-compliant data handling with exportable reporting & open API endpoints.
• Mobile (iOS & Android) + responsive web experiences.
• Target timeline: MVP demo by 30 June; full launch in Q3.

Next Steps
1. Please review and let me know of any feasibility concerns or additional questions by Monday, 20 May.
2. I’d like to arrange a 60-minute technical workshop next week to walk through the integration architecture in more detail—let me know what times work best.

Thank you for your continued collaboration. Looking forward to your feedback.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
[Title] | [Company]
"}

formatted_items.content: I’ve sent Vitality Partners an email summarizing our latest HealthHub requirements and proposed next steps, and requested their feedback and a technical workshop slot for next week. Let me know if you’d like me to adjust or follow up on anything else.
